title: Warriors-Blazers, Browns, Kevin Durant, and the Pelicans
itunes:title: Warriors-Blazers, Browns, Kevin Durant, and the Pelicans
description:
Colin discusses game 2 of the Western Conference Finals, more proof the Cleveland Browns are dysfunctional, why he feels the Golden State Warriors are not better without Kevin Durant, and his thoughts on rumors the New Orleans Pelicans refuse to trade F Anthony Davis to the Los Angeles Lakers. Guests include Chris Broussard, Albert Breer, Stephen Jackson, Marcus Thompson, and Jason McIntyre. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
